alert.note: Alert for Chase; Frontier; Hayes; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued April 13 at 6:49PM CDT until April 13 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Frontier County in southwestern Nebraska... Perkins County in southwestern Nebraska... Chase County in southwestern Nebraska... Southern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Hayes County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 745 PM CDT/645 PM MDT/. * At 648 PM CDT/548 PM MDT/, areas of blowing dust were reported. HAZARD...Less than one half mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained Spotter. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 73. Highway 83 between mile markers 27 and 66. Locations impacted include... Imperial, Grant, Curtis, Hayes Center, Wauneta, Eustis, Wallace, Madrid, Venango, Elsie, Wellfleet, Moorefield, Stockville, Lamar, Dickens, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, Enders, Champion and Crete. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
